shortDescription.default: Organization Chart Web Part - Display hierarchical org structure from Microsoft Graph

longDescription.default: A SharePoint web part that displays an interactive organizational chart. Configure a root user (VP/Manager) email address and the chart will automatically load all direct reports recursively from Microsoft Graph. Features include search, expand/collapse, zoom, and profile photos.

features.title: Organization Chart Web Part Feature
features.description: Enables the Organization Chart web part that displays hierarchical org structure.
